description: Raised $+12,000 for Hackville! Lead team of 4 to develop open source solutions for Hackademics club. Helped to created a podcast focused on spreading the word about hackathons and Hackademics.
Helped build out RBC next-generation pipeline using Kubernetes. Built tools like a work day Autoscaler to scale down development and staging machines during non working hours.
Using machine learning to create a  facial expression classifier that will strive to accurately determine a person's emotional response to specific stimuli.

Continued research on on-going fall detection project. Collected Falling data manually. Worked with project partners PointClickCare to implement a solution that used Pose Analysis and machine learning.

Worked on multiple projects. Extended and helped manage deployment of back-end and front-end functionality for an iOS and website Plant Down Time app. Helped with input on a component library for Maple Leaf Foods.

During this role, I developed many skills working with Typescript and Angular 2+. Given tasks to setup new projects Angular 2+ projects. Quickly develop user interface to anticipate and react to UX needs.
